name: Jean-Denis Haas
profile:
My name is JD and I'm an animation supervisor at Warner Brothers Animation (formerly ILM for 17+ years), teacher at Animation Mentor, my Spungella Animation Workshop and the Academy of Art University here in San Francisco.
► IMDB: https://www.imdb.com/name/nm1940902/

On this channel you will find animation tips, acting and animation analysis and tutorials for beginning to advanced animators, as well as my library of animation workshop critiques, rig reviews and more! My goal is to help you find the right information and tools in order to advance your animation career!

Drop a comment if you have any questions and let me know how I can help you and what kind of videos you'd like to see!

Thanks for checking out my animation channel!

JD
